title: Offseason Winners & Losers + The Slap & Haiku Mike - Fantasy Football Podcast for 3/29
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason discuss the biggest winners and losers from offseason moves! Which players will be impacted the most from free agent signings and trades? Plus, the latest NFL News and the 2022 outlook for A.J. Brown. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for March 29th, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(04:10) - Quick Question: A.J. Brown 2022 Outlook
(10:40) - NFL News
(27:45) - Offseason Winners
(29:30) - Tua Tagovailoa
(34:30) - James Conner
(37:20) - Broncos WRs (Courtland Sutton, Jerry Jeudy, Tim Patrick)
(41:20) - Offseason Losers
(41:25) - Seahawks (DK Metcalf, Tyler Lockett, Drew Lock)
(46:45) - D.J. Moore
(50:15) - Kyle Pitts

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
